title: Must Read: Kering Shares Fall After Demna's Gucci Appointment, Ulta's Q4 Net Sales Decreased by 1.9%
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. Following Demna's appointment as Gucci's next artistic director on Thursday, the Italian luxury house's parent company Kering saw its shares drop 11.2% in early trading on Friday. Luxury analysts have been awaiting a high-profile creative ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
